svg.text: Figure 3: Scatterplots and Regression Lines for Validated Climate-Health Relationships
All relationships show significant correlations with 95% confidence bands (Bonferroni corrected, α = 0.0125)

g.text: A. Systolic BP vs Temperature (21-day lag)
B. Systolic BP vs Apparent Temperature (21-day lag)
C. Fasting Glucose vs Land Temperature (3-day lag)

svg.text: Figure 3. Scatterplots showing the four validated climate-health relationships with regression lines and 95% confidence bands.
All correlations remain significant after Bonferroni correction for multiple testing (α = 0.0125) with statistical power ≥ 0.999.
